description:
She is part of a large family of nurses, found in almost every town. Her sisters are named the same and look identical. They are responsible for healing sick and injured Pokemon, as well as the registration for various tournaments and contests. They use Chanseys as their assistants.
They are also part of Brock`s innumerable fantasies about girls, and he seems to be the only one able to tell the various nurses apart.
name: Joy
